      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DownloadInstructions.AbstractInstructions
      An implementation of the DownloadInstructions.Instructions, which returns the bitmapUid as an URL, and which does not present any temporary nor local bitmap.

      An implementation of the DownloadInstructions.BitmapableBitmap interface specific to the Android platform.
      static class  DownloadInstructions.HandlerableHander
      An implementation of the DownloadContracts.Handlerable interface specific to the Android platform.
      static class  DownloadInstructions.Instructions
      Enables the bitmap downloader to know on how to handle a command.
      static class  DownloadInstructions.SimpleInstructions
      A very simple implementation of the DownloadInstructions.Instructions, which by-passes the persistence option.
      static class  DownloadInstructions.ViewableView
      An implementation of the DownloadContracts.Viewable interface specific to the Android platform.
